<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Eel](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=407)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 138 <sup>1.1</sup>

Although these long, narrow fish share similarities in appearance, eels are a diverse group of creatures.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Electric Eel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2970) (Creature 1), [Giant Moray Eel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2971) (Creature 5)
name: Eel
